turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I need to schedule an appointment with a general practitioner. I'm a new patient, so I don't have any existing records.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Okay, I can help with that. To get started, could you please provide your full name, date of birth, and the reason for your visit?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Ugh, alright. My name is John Smith, born on 05/12/1980. The reason for the visit is a persistent cough that I've had for about two weeks now. And I'm constantly exhausted.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Thank you, Mr. Smith. I've found a few available slots with Dr. Emily Carter. She has openings on Tuesday at 10:00 AM and Thursday at 2:30 PM. Which time works best for you?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hmm, neither of those times are ideal. I work during the week. Is there anything available on the weekend or perhaps an evening appointment? And are there any other doctors available?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I apologize, but I am currently unable to search for appointments outside of the specified time frames. However, I can check if Dr. Davis, another GP, has any evening appointments available. Would you like me to do that?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Yes, please. Let's see if Dr. Davis has anything available in the evening. If not, I suppose I'll have to figure out how to take time off.
